get.summary: Get list of documents for managerial roles
Get level 3 categories and their documents under a specified level 2 category
get.description: Returns a list of level 3 categories under the specified level 2 category, each containing an array of associated documents.

message.example: Berhasil mendapatkan Dokumentasi pada kategori level 2: Kebijakan K3

name.example: Terdapat kebijakan K3 yang tertulis, bertanggal, ditandatangani oleh pengusaha atau pengurus, secara jelas menyatakan tujuan dan sasaran K3 serta komitmen terhadap peningkatan K3.

400.description: Bad request - Category is not a level 2 category

message.example: Kategori yang diberikan bukan kategori level 2

get.summary: Get a specific document

post.summary: Approve a document
Reject a document
Request an update for a document

get.summary: Get list of documents submitted by the authenticated user

delete.summary: Delete a specific document by ID
delete.description: Soft deletes a document, sets its status to DELETED, deletes its file, and updates the approval status to DELETED for the super admin who deletes it. Only super_admin can delete. Sends a notification to the document owner.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the document to delete

delete.summary: Delete all documents under a level 3 category
delete.description: Soft deletes all documents under the specified level 3 category, sets their status to DELETED, deletes their files, and updates the approval status to DELETED for the super admin who deletes them. Only super_admin can delete. Sends notifications to document owners.

message.example: Semua Dokumentasi pada kategori berhasil dihapus

400.description: Category is not a level 3 category

message.example: Kategori harus berada di level terendah (Level 3)

get.summary: Get progress percentage for K3 assessment levels
get.description: Returns the progress percentage for Initial, Transition, and Advanced assessment levels based on approved documents in categories with matching assessment codes.

get.summary: Download all approved documents in a ZIP file
get.description: Downloads all approved documents in a ZIP file named 'documentation-YYYYMMDDHHMMSS.zip', organized in a folder structure based on category hierarchy with code prefixes (e.g., '1.1 Kebijakan K3'). Only accessible to super_admin.

message.example: Tidak ada Dokumentasi yang tersedia untuk diunduh

delete.summary: Delete all document files and set status to DELETED
delete.description: Deletes all document files from the server, sets their status to DELETED, and soft deletes them. Only accessible to super_admin. Sends notifications to document owners. Records remain in the database.

message.example: Tidak ada Dokumentasi yang tersedia untuk dihapus

get.summary: Get list of user's notifications

parameters.name: is_read
parameters.description: Filter notifications by read status (true for read, false for unread)

get.description: Retrieve a list of users with the 'manager' role, returning only id, name, and email. Accessible to all authenticated users.

put.description: Allows a super_admin to reset any user's password or a user to reset their own password.
Allows the authenticated user to update their name and email.
